cards.title: Xoros
cards.description: A Showcase Website for Architect and Design Agency 'Xoros'. It is made with pure HTML, CSS, and Javascript and is entirely responsive and Mobile Friendly.

cards.title: Writer's site
cards.description: The Showcase Website for my Activities as a Professional Writer for Theater and Radio performances. It is made with pure HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

cards.title: Shapp
cards.description: The Shapp is a Commissioned Web App realized by the Students of the Social Hackers Academy. I Manage, Supervise, and Assure the Quality of The App.

cards.title: Square
cards.description: Project For A Native and Web App allowing to Share and Read Short Stories.

cards.title: Space-Dog Fights
cards.description: Space-Dog Fights is a Parodic Game Based on Douglas Adams' work. It is written in Pure Javascript (ES5). Each Dog Has a Different Combination of Commonly Used Parameters for the Linear Congruential Generator Algorithm. Here you can see How Microsoft Visual Basic holds against Turbo Pascal or C++.

cards.title: Hack My Dungeon
cards.description: Started as a Lesson in Object-Oriented Programming, Hack My Dungeon is Now being Developped into a full Dungeon-Crawler-Map'n Hack-RPG Video Game. The Player navigates an open world and hacks his way out of dungeons by reading the rooms' code and writing Javascript programs.

cards.title: DragonBones and Pixi Animation
cards.description: Integrating DragonBones Animations Software and Pixi.js Visual Engine Constituted a Challenge. Not Anymore.

cards.title: Hanged Inc.
cards.description: Narrative game based on the theater piece 'Hanged'. The player embodies one of the three Characters of the Piece: Hanged people who don't die and are bound to get along together. The Game needs a custom game engine allowing animations synchronized with text. Under development.

cards.title: Caesar
cards.description: Concept art for the main Character for a Black and White Stealth Game.

cards.title: Sprites
cards.description: Pixel Art Sprites For Fantasy Soldiers.

cards.title: Hanged
cards.description: In a society where suicide is so rife that it sustains a whole start-up economy, three lost souls found themselves still alive after they hanged themselves. They are now sentenced to live together under the same gallows. It's a Humorous and Absurd Theater Performance Involving that the Performers stay hanging for fne hour and a half. Without dying, preferably.

cards.title: The Trial Of Peer Gynt
cards.description: A Familial Drama involving a Son who's a writer and a Myth-maniac Father who thinks he's Peer Gynt.

cards.title: The Atomic Diaries
cards.description: During The WWII, in the United States, amid the War Projects which involved women workers, there was the making of the First Atom Bomb. This is the story of those women. The two 45 mn radio pieces are based on real facts, and were performed live on the Air.

cards.title: Kaspar
cards.description: Kaspar refers to the true story of Kaspar Hauser: A human being imprisoned and secluded from the world for 16 years and then abruptly had to face civilization. I wrote and created the Set Design For The Performance.

cards.title: Le Theatre Parle Au Theatre
cards.description: One Year of Weekly Parodic Theatre Reviews, played live on the Radio.

cards.title: Joseph
cards.description: Commissioned Theater Piece About The Infamous Minister Of Propaganda Joseph Goebbels. The Performance Was performed at The Lyon Deportation and Resistance Memorial Museum.

bio.title: Hi,
descriptions: My name is Miguel. I'm a writer and artist who can code.
It started out of sheer curiosity and quickly developped into an addiction for getting things done.
I develop Web Application with the credo: 'Ethic and Usability'.
I create Video Games with the credo: 'Pedagogy and Dark Humor'.
I apply this technological and human knowlege to teach web development and soft skills in Athens, Greece.
